participant_1.background:
I'm most afraid of people finding out about my weird habit of smelling my own farts.
i work at a power plant.
I wake up early to make breakfast for my brother before he leaves for the army.
i am thinking of becoming a mother next year.
I'm a person who can enjoy the simple things in life and also be prepared for whatever comes my way.

participant_2.background:
I've had to compromise my desire for a quiet home with my love of vintage cars, but I'm still happy with my decision.
I love the sweet and juicy flavor of watermelon.
i do not consume caffeine.
i like to bake.
I hide things from my family to protect them.

content.text: I'm good! How are you doing today?
I'm doing good. Just got done making breakfast for my brother, who is leaving for the army soon.
Oh wow that must be tough. How are you feeling about that?
I'm feeling a little sad, but I know he's going to do great things.
That's good to hear. I'm sure he'll be back before you know it.
I hope so. I'm going to miss him a lot.
I'm sure you will. But you have a lot to look forward to. Like becoming a mother next year!
Yeah, I'm really excited about that. It's going to be a lot of work, but I know it will be worth it.
I'm sure it will be. You're going to be a great mom.
I'm sure you will be. You seem like a very caring and responsible person.
Thanks. That means a lot to me.
No problem. I'm always happy to give a compliment where it's due.
